channel.title: Ammonium on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Ammonium on funPlantGenes

item.title: CitAMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitAMT1 Gene Name: ammonium transporter1 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis x Poncirus trifoliata Functional Descriptions: Ammonium transport and CitAMT1 expression are regulated by N in Citrus plants.

item.title: PagGS1;2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PagGS1;2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus alba × P.

item.title: TaAMT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaAMT2|3a Gene Name: AMT2-type ammonium transporter Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaAMT2|3a|TaAMT2|3a, a wheat AMT2-type ammonium transporter, facilitates the infection of stripe rust fungus on wheat.
